p.d: When the owner of a toy factory is murdered one man in particular intrigues the investigating team: Xavier Cuenot, a ventriloquist who is never without his puppet. Indeed, all the evidence points towards the disturbing wooden doll... Directed by: Akim Isker (France, 2019) Screenplay: Camille Pouzol, Julie-Anna Grignon, Julien Anscutter Cast: Carole Weyers (Déa Versini), François Vincentelli (Jimmy), Ambroise Michel (Matthieu Delcourt), Bruno Gouery (Fred Jolin), Fleur Geffrier (Jeanne Granger), Pierre Laplace (Xavier Fremont), Bastien Bernini (Damien), François Dunoyer (Massimo Versini), Damien Jouillerot (Xavier Cuenot) Genre: detective Awards: best actress (Carole Weyers), 2019 Séries Mania festival
